content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting around a fire with my mother, a couple neighbors, and the owner of our complex, when i looked up over my apartment and saw the most brilliant blue orb, looking no larger than five feet in diameter, plummet from the sky as if it had appeared out of nowhere. i proceeded to explain to the people around what i had seen and realized that no one else had been looking in the direction at the time. 
  i decided to walk out to the back area where i saw the light disappear behind my building, and saw the light skipping around the field, which used to be an old trash dump many years ago.
  shocked, i went back and told the only person i felt comfortable what i had seen. my mother then went behind the building and saw the orb that now had split into two different and smaller orbs with the same bright blue light.
  i abandoned the area out of slight fear and confusion; i am not generally the type to see fantastical things. i am generally a write a list and prove your procedure type person. this was really strange and i have never experienced anything like it in my twenty-one years.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a bright blue orb fall straight down from the sky, and then hover and zip around over the old dump behind my apartment.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a car with two family members. it was around 10 pm, we were headed west and right over mountain we noticed a huge crescent moon. we all gasped because it was so pretty, the sort where you see the bright crescent part and the rest of the shadowed part. i wanted to take a picture of it.

one of the family members then said that the moon was in the wrong spot, that is should have been over us and not on the horizon. and then we realized that it was in the wrong phase because the actual moon was full.

it began to "set" over the mountain, and within seconds it disappeared completely.

we were all pretty stunned and pretty certain we'd seen some sort of atmospheric rarity or weather pattern but i have no idea what kind. my sister and i  continued to drive around the area after dropping off the third car member but we couldn't find it anymore.
content.summary: Saw a "false crescent moon" over the mountains when it shouldn't have been there, and it was not in the right phase of the actual moon.

content.detailedDescription: i was just walking my dog out side and as always i like to look up at the stars. well this  time when i looked up it looked as if there was a star falling to earth and i was about to call my husband donny but there wasnt enough time. because at that exact moment what seemed to appear as a falling star actually turned out to be what seemed to be a ship of some kind. so i just stood there and watched in amazment at the sight before me. and like i said it was unlike anything i had ever witnessed. it was trully amazing.It was kind of hard to tell what it looked like but it was bigger at the bottom and got skinnier at the top. the bottom also kind of spunaroundin a counter clock wise motion and had like two lights on opposite sides that seemed to wink at you. then just as i was about to go in to get the camera the ship seemed to hover for another second or two  and then it just lifted up in to the sky and flew off. just like that it was gone.
content.summary: It was unlike anything ive ever witnessed

content.detailedDescription:
Around 10:50 i stepped out my back door and immediately noticed a low-flying sphere like object moving slowly towards me from the north.  thought it may be an airplane at first but it looked a little too bright.  i waited to see if there were any flashing lights and the object seemed to be slowly weaving back and forth as it moved. i watched it for maybe 15 seconds and it slowly started to turn red and dim out until it vanished. absolutely no noise coming from the object and i usually hear any aircraft that close.  
  about 5 minutes later i was still looking around the sky, looked straight up and saw a very bright white light flash that lasted for less than 1 second. looked almost venus appearing and disappering.  10 second later another flash but very dim in exact same spot.  no clouds in the sky or anything to distort my view.
content.summary: Very bright low flying light that slowly turned red as it dimmed out

content.detailedDescription:
On july 24th on the pacific region of southern british columbia in penticton, i was on my balcony looking for signs of smoke clouds from the 4 fires we have burning aproximetly 60 miles north, north west of my location. after standing in the corner of my balcony stairing to the east i moved my eyes to the south and my eyes caught an object in the sky.

     normally when i see somthing shiny in the sky i don't think anything of it, my city lies along one of the flight paths big planes use to fly in between calgary or toronto, or back to vancouver. but in this case my attention was instantly atracted to this object.

    normally when i see a jet flying there is almost always a con trail behind it, this was not the case for this object. now i am aware that this has no significant meaning, however the object did not seem to have a typical flight path or even similar speed compared to that of a normal jet lyner flying over head. now the object at first glance was aproximetly 5-10 miles south, south west of my location at aproximetly     10 000ft, flying north, north east. 

   as i noticed the object, i was drawn to its shape, now when i see a jet i immeadietly notice the round shape to the fusilage of the plane, now with this object i could not determine wether the object was rounded or more boomerang shaped. 

   more to the point i noticed that there were no wings on the object. by the time i noticed it had no wings it was turning directly north, no longer heading in an easterly position, as if it was noticing someone noticing it. so its movement looked like what i would define as an s turn.

   it was originally heading in an north easterly position when it then turned to a northenly position, proceeding north and almost flying directly over my position and then turning back to the north easterly position it had originally been heading on. its turn time lasted from start to finish no more then 15 seconds.

   now this object made no sound, it had no defineable markings on it or 
tail which is visible on all jets when they are turning. the object had two white lights being emited from under the tip and the middle of the object. in comparison to the legnth & width to the object each light was no more then four feet wide, or five. if i had to estimate the legnth of the object it was in between 80 & 150ft in legnth & 50 to 80 feet wide.

 
   now atfer the object began turning east following its original heading it dissapeared in behind the cloud cover. now from where the clouds were positioned the object should have emerged  on the other side of the cloud cover with in 5-10 seconds. but it never did and i never saw it again.

    immeadietly after i saw the object i tried phoning the local air port and finding out if they saw the object or atleast picked it up on radar but i could not get in touch with anyone from the tower. so i wound up leaving a message on the transport canada 1-800 line with the time, location and question of wether or not there was any object or plane tracked in this location at that time. so right after that i thought of m.U.F.O.N. and new that i had to write down my sighting.  

   i have seen multiple sightings in penticton, so mabey this is a good spot for sky hunting. so thanks for this opportunity once again. and lets hope that one day soon we are all able to confront the complicated truths that exsist, and that the great mystery and shroud will be unvailed for all to know, and even though some do not want us to know, yet, we will one day.
content.summary: The object was cylindtrical & had 2 white lights eminating from the underside of  the object. the legnth is aprox.. 150ft

content.detailedDescription: This is further to my previous report.  i wanted to add that the first object seen was about magnitude 0 or brighter.  through 15x70 binoculars only the bright orange light could be seen.  it did not change in brightness like a light which is aimed might be expected to do.  it moved slowly, like a satellite.  the second object, trailing the station, was not observed with aid.  possibly, it was not related to the first object, but it was quite a coincidence.
content.summary: Object following space station - more information.

content.detailedDescription: An object was seen following about 8 degrees behind the station on its pass at this time.  it was about magnitude 3.5.  this followed by two minutes sighting of object overhead heading nw.  when northwest of us and at 25 degrees altitude as seen from here, this first object made very sharp turn to south towards area where station passed.  it was then lost behind a tree.  however, this may have been coincidental.
content.summary: Object following space station.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were swimming in our pool in our back yard.  we live in the country, and are often able to see satellites.  we watched a very bright satellite head move over head- roughly west to east, we think it was the iss( you could possible establish an exact time with this information)  right afterward my husband noticed a very bright light ( different from the iss- much brighter) come from the the west/southwest area.  he pointed it out to me, and we watched it move across the sky, going east/northeast pretty slowly.  it was at a low altitude for a plane, and we both thought it was a plane that was taking off and gaining altitude and had it's take-off lights on.  no lights flashed on the plane, and we waited to see if it would turn the lights off and the blinking lights on.  when the object what at the very top of the sky, around the brightest star that is in the middle of the sky, the light began to dim.  the light faded to a reddish color, and then disappeared altogether.  we expecting to see flashing lights, or possibly dimmer lights, but the entire thing just disappeared.  we continued to watch the trajectory for another couple of minutes, but lights never appeared again.  we never heard a plane engine or any noise from the object, but to be fair, out filter on our pool was running, as well as the central air conditioning unit in our back yard.  the light was very very bright and stayed the same brightness until it completely faded out. it was moving in a straight line, but did not appear to be gaining or losing altitude. we often watch the night sky, because we have such a fantastic view out here in the country.  we have seen military craft ( my husband is a military aircraft buff),regular and private aircraft,meteors, satellites, the iss, and iridium flares, and nothing we have ever seen looked like this. to our knowledge, all aircraft must have lights on at night in american airspace.
content.summary: Looked like a large aircraft with it's takeoff lights on, but only one visible light- bright

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking the dog. i'm looking every time i walk outside. i seen a brght light in the west/north/west heading in a east south eastern direction. was only 1000 to 1500 feet in the air. was waitng to seen flashing lights. i have seen planes not have visable light at different angles. but as it only passed a quarter mile away from going over me, it was making no noise.I have a mag light 4-d batteries with a led bulb. it is focused to a small smot very far away from you like a laser. its very bright. i started to flash my light on and off at different speeds, like morse code. it started to speed up and went strait up into space!! only a mile away!!! it did not fly over the horizon. it went almost strait up! never thought i would see what a ship going strait out into space looks like. some one had to see it also and get a video, i hope. that was the coolest thing i have ever seen. i was in air force r.O.T.C in high school. we learned about planes, space shuttle, x-15. you name it, i have done a report on it.  i have flown a plane before so i know how to fly a plane, and how it flies. ( the science of it.) even how a helicopter flies and any of them sound. flown in a huey-- or uh-1.You get to know the sound and how they fly. so you know when you see what doesn't fly like that! jeff tonn
content.summary: Just a bright light with small dim light in front. dim light never got closer or farther from main light.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out the front door to take the dog out about 10:20 and i always look up at the sky to look for shooting stars and constellations. i got to the street and turned around looking ne above my house i saw what i thought at first was an airplane approaching or leaving the local airport which is about 5 miles away to the north. it was moving about the same speed as a very low level jet but seem to be at a much higher altitude and as i looked closer it looked more like a star - round. it was about 80% above the horizon if 90% is directly overhead. as i walked slowly down the street i kept my eye on it and it continued to move smoothly n to s and i watched it for about 15 seconds until it just shrank into nothing or slowly dimmed to become invisible. there was no trail as with a shooting star and moved too slow to be a shooting star. my eyes followed its trajectory thinking i would see running lights if it were a jet aircraft that had just turned off its landing lights but there were no lights whatsoever and i listened closely for any jet engine or other engine sounds but heard nothing while it was visible or after it became invisible.
content.summary: White ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
Taking random pictures of the clouds, hoping to catch something. it is a pretty common thing to do. i always do a complete circle from my back deck, about 8 pictures total every time. this showed up on the second batch. looks like a triangle, but if anyone can focus it into a bird or bug, please do.

i also catch random discs occasionally, but they are always out of focus
content.summary: Taking pics, nothing there, but showed up when downloaded

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were standing outside on his back porch thursday night the 23rd. i have always been intrigued by the ufo phenomena and it has become habit everytime i go outside just to give a quick glance to the sky and check it out. on two different occasions i have seen objects that definately were not explainable in the past year in the springfield area. the funny part is i have always told my friend about it with him always responding with "i would have to see it to believe it!" none of them, however, was as close or vivid as this particular one. as soon as we walked outside i glanced up and noticed a light about as bright as the north star but it appeared to be moving. i showed my buddy and he instantly said he thought it was a plane. i laughed at him and pointed out how bright it was yet at this point it was almost directly under us. not to mention no strobe or pulsating lights. we watched it continue on over our heads until it was just past us and went from very bright to a very faint light and steadily decreased in brightness until it was completely gone. i waited about 20 seconds listening to hear something in case it was in fact a plane or helicopter. i have grown up around aircraft and consider myself fairly knowledgeable when it comes to flying objects and i know for a fact that this was flying low enough that even if it was a small cesna that we would have heard the engines eventually. long story short my buddy was pretty freaked out and called another friend to hear his story of just about the same exact experience he had another time when he was with me. both incidents took place within a week of each other and within 5 miles of each other
content.summary: Very bright light traveled from nw to se directly overhead with no flashing lights or sound and proceeded to dissapear right in front of us...

content.detailedDescription: Around 3 30 am on july 24th 2009. my roomate and i were walkng back to the house when we noticed an odd looking star. we had never seen this star before and were not sure what to think of it so we started watching it. as we watched it we noticed that it was moving sparatically so we called a friend on the other side of town and woke him up to verify that we werent hallucinating. he confirmed that he saw the same bright light in the sky that is normally not there. he got his video camera out and briefly filmed the object. the object had flashing lights on it and had blue and green lights flickering from it. it continued moving across the sky slowly but when it moved it would move like it was hovering with sparatic bursts back and forth and up and down. i continued watching the object untill 5:40 am hoping the sun would shed some light on the object. with the morning light the stars behind began to fade however the light that was coming from the object was still just as bright. above and to the south of it were two more faint blue and red flashing lights that were still shinning even when the little dipper faded. as well as one more set of blue and red flashing lights to the far north of the closest and brightest object. as the morning light got brighter you could vaguely make out a saucer shaped object with bright white lights on the top of saucer shape. i continued watching the object hoping it would be completely visible in the sun light. around 5 30 am i witnessed two more objects fly by way faster than the object in question. one looked to be a stealth bomber shape high in the air moving rapidly from the northwest to the south east. shortly after that another aircraft flying from west to east flew by and confirmed for me that this was not an airplane or helicopter of some sort. shortly after the two aircrafts flew bye the sun rose higher and the object shrunk. it stayed just as bright as it was when it was closer but just seemed to be rising further and further away. i guaged the rising of the object with a telephone wire behind my apartment it started from hovering around 5 inches below the wire {from my perspective} to being 10 inches above the wire within 10 minutes. as it got higher it shrunk but stayed just as bright. at that time i decided it was time to stop observing the event and went back inside. only time will tell if what i saw was a confirmed ufo. i still need to watch my friends video camera aswell as check the sky tonight in order see if the object is still there. the entire sighting lasted about 2 and half hours during that time the object had moved from the north east skies to the eastern skies by the time i was unable to clearly make it out.
content.summary: Ufo hovered over avon colorado for about 2 and half hours moving from the northeast sky to the easter sky

content.detailedDescription:
Not sure if anyone is interested, but i found what "appeared to be a silver disc shaped object in the sky in a photo from 2007.  i was looking for a business on google maps and while viewing the photo of the street, i tried zooming for a better view and accidently ended up looking at the sky, where i saw the "object".  it doesn't appear to be a reflection since a part of it is clearly behind a small cloud. did not look like any aircraft i'm familiar with.  a very curious thing.

in case anyone would like to take a look, the address i googled was 3128 forest lane, dallas, tx.  i then changed the view to look at the businesses across the street (toward burlington coat factory) and that is where i saw the object in the sky.
content.summary: Silver disc shaped object in photo on google maps

content.detailedDescription: We were downtown and i looked up and thought i was looking at a plane but the object was to close to the ground and to small to be a plane. it looked like two crafts about two inches apart and each had two white lights on them they moved very slow much slower than a plane and they turned and moved across the sky while keeping the same distance between them.  we chased them for a while as they moved just above the first level of the low hanging storm clouds they would reappear at times but eventually the clouds got to heavy to see it. we saw many other planes in the sky that night and none of them came even remotely close to looking like what we saw in the sky earlier.
content.summary: Two crafts two lights each

content.detailedDescription:
Sheffield, england, on feb/22/2009 

early sunday morning as i was coming back from the paper shop, i noticed there were some strange looking and very *fast* moving clouds in the sky. as i was looking at these unusual clouds, i noticed a cylinder shaped object in a clear part of the sky, almost directly above me and i was trying to figure out what it was. it was shining (apparently because of reflected sunlight) and it couldn't have been a helicopter because it was the wrong shape and it couldn't have been a plane because it wasn't moving nor did it have wings - it like was shiny log in the sky! 

there was no sound except from the wind and an unusual amount of pigeons which at very regular intervals, were being scared by nothing i could see or hear. i have not seen pigeons act like that before (nor since) and no-one was around except me, who was perfectly still while looking at the object in the sky. so what was scaring the pigeons? 

it was surreal and within a few minutes a cloud went under the object, which made me realise that it was higher up than i thought and then i realise it was much larger than a plane! 

so i hurried home (about 20 yards away) and got my camera realising that that the cloud under the object would soon clear so i could take a picture of the object. so i went back to the same spot to take my picture and after a minute or two that part of the sky (and most of the sky) was clear - but the object had gone! 

thing is, it couldn't have been any type of balloon because: 
1) while i was looking at it, it didn't move. 
2) within the short time it took me to get my camera and return to the same spot it had gone! 

balloons do not move that fast - nor as far as i understand, do they keep still in very strong wind. can't have it both ways. 

i understand that there can be a different in air currents at different altitudes but i cannot understand how it could be stationary for the few minutes i was looking at it, yet a minute or two later, it had disappeared! 


(5) my own feelings towards the object is that it was not hostile but apparently the pigeons were scared by it.
content.summary: Cylinder object seen in the uk

content.detailedDescription:
on approx. 06/05/09 at around 9:00pm i visited a friend who lived on the outskirts of rosepine, la.  we went outside and stood in his driveway, my friend facing towards the east, and i across from him leaning on the hood of my car facing west.  as we stood there my friend pointed over my right shoulder and asked "what the hell is that".  i turned and looked behind me.  i observed that across the street were several approx. 100 ft pine trees at about a hunderd yards east of where we were standing.  i observed that just below the highest tree branches was a bright yellow light shining through.  i could tell the light was a good distance away but it stayed stationary for a few minutes before appearing to drop in altitude and disappearing.  my friend said that from where he stood there had been three lights and had been in a triangle formation and had been moving strangly.  i told my friend not to get excited and that i had seen those kind of lights before, some months before, and that i thought it was just flares. 
 we talked about what he had seen for awhile.  i first assumed that the lights had been miltary flares from the local military base, fort polk.  my friend brought to my attention that the base was to the north of where we were standing, and the training area was futher north and towards the west.  i laughed it off as a over active imagination.
  it was at that time my friend pointed over my shoulder again and said "there they are again".  i looked over my shoulder again and saw just above the same pine trees as before three bright yellow lights in a triangle formation, the "point" facing up.  i moved into the yard, a couple of feet towards the north for a better view.  i observed that the lights seem to dip and bob, moving eraticaly.  i observed that the lights again appeared to be far to the east, over what i could only guess was pitkin la.  the lights slowly moved below the tree line again and blinked out.
  my friend and i were both shocked and started trying to come up with an excuse.  we are both ex-military, air force and navy.  in my expeirence the flares used for illumination by the miltary are a brillant white, not a yellowish color, almost like a "bug light" you use on an outside light.  my friend agreed and told me that he had never seen flares act like that.  he also explained that it wasn't chaff from an aircraft because it was dropped alot at one time, not three.
  as we stood there talking about what we thought it was another thirty minutes or so had passed.  again my friend pointed over my shoulder.  i turned again and saw the same lights over the tree line.  i observed that the lights were again in a triangle formation and seemed to "dip and bob" as they moved towards the tree line.  
  about thirty minutes later my friends wife came out to see why we were standing in yard still.  we explained what we had seen to her and that we didn't think it was the military.  as she laughed it off and began to go inside, my friend yelled out "look, there they are".  again it was the same bright yellow lights, in a roughly triangle formation that "dipped and bobbed" as they moved slowly towards the tree line and out of sight.  this time i extended my arm, the thumb of my hand up, and fingers spread, pinkie finger even with the horizon.  i observed from where i stood the lights where just above my index finger.  that was my best way of calculating where in the sky the lights had been when they appeared. as best as i can remember the my friend and i had seen the lights on and off for approx. two hours. 
  on the fourth of july i stopped by my friends again.  i jokingly asked him if he had seen anymor ufo's.  my friend, who works at the airstrip on fort polk, said he had asked a person he knew at the tower the day after the incident if there had been anyone training in the area.  he was told there hadn't been any aircraft near that location that would have dropped flares, but he had heard that more had seen the lights than us.
content.summary: Three bright yellow lights in triangle formation moving in spiral across sky.  the lights would disappear for a short time only to return in the same location approx. thirty minutes later.  this contiued for approx. 2 hours.

content.detailedDescription: I am spending the summer in rural south western oregon. i spend most evening outdoors, and every night i see multiple bright lights that move in slowly from different directions. from a distance they appear to be aeroplane head lights, but as they come closer it becomes evident that they are not. they are silent, with no flashing lights, and they dissapear completely just when they begin to get close enough to us that we notice thewy aren't planes. come to think of it, i rarely see planes fly over at all, and i'm outside all day. sometimes it will at first seem to be a satelite, moving slowly in orbit around the earth, and suddenly -within seconds- it will gain light intensity until it is 3x brighter/larger than the brightest object in the night sky (with the exception of the moon). they stay bright for varrying amounts of time, and i have seen them fade in a matter of seconds, far off in the distance as well as directly above our location.  they normally appear alone, but there will usually be three or four flyovers in an evening, from multiple directions. others here have seen them as well, and several of them have witnessed the objects while hanging out on the lawn in the evening.
content.summary: Nightly in wolf creek: brilliant slow moving lights that fade in and out of sight

content.detailedDescription: This afternoon between 5 and 5:30p while friend and i were standing in my driveway talking before they went home.I heard and then saw the local police helicopter make a low pass over my house at about 500 feet.I commented to friend that maybe they were looking for someone.After it flew over i noticed something flashing up at a higher altitude at about 1000-2000 feet toward's the east in an area that would be in the general vicinity of san jose airport about 6 mile's from our position.I thought it was just a mylar type balloon,but is was fairly windy and after observing object it stayed in the same position.It was either pulsating light or reflecting sunlight off of shiny reflective surface.The light flashes seem to be at regular rapid interval's,too fast to be a balloon rotating.Friends and i watched for about 10-15 minute's then freind's had to leave.After they left(couple of minute's) i glanced back to where object was and it was no longer there.I then went to my backyard with binocular's and video camera and watched the sky for about an hour but saw nothing.The weather was pretty clear with very few whispy small cloud's and good breeze during afternoon.If i see object again i will try to video and post.There was a post recently on this recent sighting's in ca. at night in the last few day's that sound's very similar.
content.summary: Spherical object hovering and pulsating or reflecting sunlight while rotating.

content.detailedDescription: At my home , at 10:03pm,july 23, 2009 sis knocked on my door then left, standing outside i looked up (straight up) and a bright yellow orb at about 4-5,000 ft up heading east,floated out of a cloud, i thought it was a plane but thought it odd no lights blinking at all. i knew imeadiatly what it was and yelled for a friend to come look, at that moment it slowed and began to rock back and forth as if a wind hit it (no wind out, cloudy and humid) then started acending slowly then rapidly straight up until it was no longer visable.No sound at all. my first siteing of an orb/craft. my guess at size was about as big as 2 cars, or 20-25 ft around. my friend missed seeing it by 2 sec. , watched for an hour after , but no signs of it. it was very exciting,i yelled "come back" and wanted to see more or get a picture, but darn. on april 23, 2009 i saw an orb that looked just like a giant firefly about 30 ft. over my house, very fast, and have been watching to see another ever since! didn`t report that one. no biggies as far as siteings i guess. no photos unfortunatly.
content.summary: Brt.Yell.Orb,slow out of cloud at 4,000ft. ,slower with a rock back n forth, then acended rapidly straight up.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room using my computer. i had the window open because it was to hot inside. i look to my left ,which is east, and i noticed a light in the sky above one of the trees in the horizon. at first i taught it was an airplane. i taught this 'airplane' was going to land on tijuana international airport. sure enough it came down but, for several seconds the object hovered and since i had first noticed it changed brightness. the object then began to move slowly to my left heading north. it then began to go down again slowly and it disapear behind a hill in the horizon. several minutes later a similar if not the same object appeared on a different spot in the horizon. this second object moved to my right and left an like the first object it moved slowly. this objects were anything from 2 miles to 10 miles away. this objects did not have a probe like regular aircraft. their light was white in color, and as i saw them i felt exitement. i taught of getting my binoculars but i didn't because i taught i would miss something. i have lived behind the tijuana airport. i see helicopters from naval outlying field imperial beach 24/7. i know how naval aircraft look like. what i saw was different. i began to fill this report because those lights came back this time i saw them more than 4 times. the most peculiar of this sightings were that two lights appeared close to each other they descended a small distance then the lower one ascended a small distance and the higher one disappeared. the remainig one whent behind the hill. the last light that i have seen this night dissapeared before descending behind the hill. i would like to be contacted through email first if i am contacted.
content.summary: Saw it from a few kilometers away, changed brightness

content.detailedDescription:
Avistan ovnis en ensenada 
 
 
los ovnis fueron videograbados por residentes de la zona.
por csar crdova/el vigia   
2009-07-21 00:00:00
ensenada, b.C. - dos objetos voladores no identificados (ovnis) de forma triangular y con luces de colores rojo, blanco y azul, fueron avistados la noche del lunes por cientos de familias que residen en colonias aledaas al vaso de la presa emilio lpez zamora. 
alrededor de las 23:15 horas, los ovnis fueron observados y videograbados por habitantes de la zona noreste de la ciudad. 
testigos del fenmeno visual relataron que los cuerpos luminosos realizaron varias maniobras circulares en el aire, para posteriormente regresar a su posicin inicial, es decir, permanecan estticos un tiempo y luego se movan en crculos, pero nunca se alejaron del vaso de la presa. 
las luces de los objetos voladores alternaban entre los colores rojo, blanco y azul, siendo la luz blanca la ms intensa. 
uno de los objetos era de mayor tamao, mientras que el ms pequeo se alineaba con el primero luego de efectuar los crculos. ninguno emita sonido de motor, slo un zumbido similar al que produce una estacin de electricidad. 
incluso personas que se dieron cita en la orilla de la presa revelaron que la luz color blanco tena forma semejante a un cuerpo celeste, y que se desplazaba en el cielo junto a los otros objetos, para posteriormente desaparecer alrededor de las 1:00 horas de este martes. 
los residentes observaron los cuerpos luminosos con binoculares, otros grababan los movimientos con sus cmaras. 
el viga trat de comunicarse con personal de la base area nmero 3 de la fuerza area mexicana, ubicada en el ciprs, pero no contestaron. 

translation:


ufos sighted in ensenada

reported by caesar cordova  for     el vigia(daily newspaper)
july 7, 2009


ensenada, bc

two triangular shaped unidentified flying objects with red, white and blue lights were sighted 
monday night by hundreds of families that live in the area of the reservoir dam, emilio lopez zamora.

at around 11:15pm the ufos were sighted and videorecorded by residents of the northeast section of the city.

witnesses to the visual phenomenon said that the luminous objects made several circular maneuvers in the air before returing to their original position, that is to say, they remained static for a while then began circling while  never moving far from the reservoir.

the light of the flying objects alternated from red to white to blue with the white light being the brightest.

one of the objects was smaller than the other  and alighned itself with the larger object before beginning the circling maneuvers.  there was no sound of any engine..Just a buzz like the sound produced by a power station.

some people meeting on the shore of the reservoir revealed that the larger object had the form of a celestial body and  maneuvered close to the other objects  in the sky before disappearing around 1am tuesday morning.

el vigia attempted to communicate with base #3 of the mexican air force, located in el cipres, but the calls went unanswered.
content.summary: This is approximately 5 miles from wherei spotted similar objects 2 weeks ago

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking in the river-front park with my friend and her son.  we were walking north, walked around the northern turn-around of the trail and began heading back toward our car.  i glanced up as we were talking and saw five bright orange "stars" to the south-southeast at probably 30 degrees off the horizon, just above some orange streetlights (similar color).  there were clouds behind these "stars."  at first i thought it was some strange reflection of the streetlights, but then i took a longer look and pointed these stars out to my friend.  she saw them clearly, as well.  neither of us could figure out what they were.  be began walking to the east so that the lights would no longer be just underneath the stars, and the stars didn't move.  we stood there watching them intently for a couple of minutes, at which point two of them began to fade.  after about one minute the two faded beyond my range of vision (they were "gone") and one by one the other three began to fade as well.  none of these objects appeared to be moving at any speed, although i did notice at least two of them move a small amount, slowly, in relation to the position of the others.

the formation of these five "stars" was like this:

*
     *
          *                         *





                              *


hopefully that conveys well as a diagram.

my friend and i continued on, there were some people nearby when we saw all of this, but they were hispanic and they didn't respond when i tried to get their attention, i'm guessing they didn't speak english very well.  we continued walking south toward the car, when we encountered other people, they were carrying on as if they had not noticed these lights.  we felt a little like our sanity would be questioned if we brought it up to others at this point -- you know how the stigma is.

so at this point, we saw five bright-orange unidentified objects in the sky.  i'm not claiming they are aliens or anything like that, but we very clearly both saw the exact same thing and i've read some other reports on here now describing these same lights in different locations and formations.  i absolutely believe my eyes.  to answer the inevitable question, no we had not been drinking alcohol or taking any kind of drugs.  i don't even smoke cigarettes.  i'm a very clean, healthy person.  i have a career in computer science, my friend is a housewife with a 2 year old son (who, as i mentioned, was with us).  neither of us is under any unreasonable stress beyond what most people encounter in day-to-day life.

i'm sorry, i do not have a camera phone, so i was unable to capture any kind of visual of this :(
content.summary: Five bright orange "star" lights in sky, below clouds

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a close friend of mine were both at our high school the other night(longwood high school). we were sitting on the bleacher reminissing of our high school track career. the whole time i had been zoning off looking at the stars and airplanes and what not in the sky. suddenly me and my friend austin noticed a orange light kind of flying upwards over bnl.I started to joke with him that this strange orb was a ufo. the object looked like it was about a mile away when it stopped in its upward path and morphed from a bright orb into a very sharp triangular object. when it had shifted from an orb to a triangle it let off a strong flash. once done morphing it hovered in place for about a minute and then it headed flying over where me and my friend were. it passed directly over us! when it flew over i knew it wasnt any plane or helicopter or any thing i had ever seen in my life. it was trianlge shaped. it had larger triangle in the middle and 3 trianles on the outside. the lights were a dim yellow and never blinked. when i saw it i was amazed and a bit scarred, but more excited. the object flew out of sight over the horizon once it passed over us.


my personal opinion is it was some kind of military craft that was very silent and it might have been flown out of bnl. im not too convinced it was an alien craft becuase it didnt fly at incredible speed but it did hover for a while then it could change speeds very fast.
content.summary: Ufo spotted transfiguring over brookhaven national lab

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on fodren waiting to turn left on westhiemer.  i noticed in the overcast sky a black orb moving straight in a north west direction.  it moved rather quickly, about the same speed and altitude as i have seen helicopters travel in that area. it maintained the same altitude as it traveled accross th sky. i had to turn finally and buildng and trees obstructed my view.  when i could see the northern horizon again, the object was gone.  it didn't wobble, it moved with purpoe and didn't look like a balloon.
content.summary: A black orb moving accoss the sky

content.detailedDescription: My family was camping at south higgins lake state park in michigan south of grayling. we were standing outside our camper when my mom pointed to the sky where there were several balls of fire heading west right over us. at first i had counted six but a few seconds later a few more appeared, there might have been around eight. at first i thought it was a bunch of balloons that were on fire or had candles hanging from them making them glow, a few looked like they had short tales of fire coming from either side. a friend and his family, about 100 feet south of us at another campsite, thought they were helicopters, but they made no sound. it had rained earlier so there were clouds, my mom was sure they were lower then the clouds. they all went in the same direction some seemed to move side to side while heading west it seemed as they were going higher, three started to fly in a triangle. as for my feelings, it mostly was of curiosity. we lost sight of the object after it had gone behind the trees. i do know there is a national guard base very close to there, but if these were aircraft below the clouds they would have made a sound. i regret very much not taking a picture, but i don't think my camera would have made a quality picture
content.summary: Fireballs over higgins lake in the northern the lower peninsula michigan

content.detailedDescription: I found a way to take photographs of light images that are not there.   the images are beautifully colored and amazing.  i believe they are communication signals from another dimension, maybe trying to let us know that we are not alone.   at first i was afraid of what i was looking at.  then i was amazed, looking thru the beautiful rays of color and images that appeared.
content.summary: Ulos (unidentified light objects)

content.detailedDescription: The short description of the event i witnessed a star like object hovering north of i94 east near jackson michigan while driving around 1230am back to detroit. june 28th, the object drew my attention due to it's abnormal brightness and it changed it's location while i tried to watch it while driving then after 10minutes it blinked out like a light bulb being turned off.  myself and other verifiable witnesses have seen this same object over the last two years hovering or operating around metro detroit "dtw" airport now it has moved to jackson airport area near i94. we "my friends and other witnesses" have dubbed this object the light bulb because it catches your attention as being a very bright star or planet? but maneuvers around if you watch it long enough then eventually "blinks" out like a light bulb.  someone other than myself and a bunch of people have had to have witnessed this i hope you have already investigated it.  if not then get your cameras ready cause it is here and has been here, i am former military and so are most of the witnesses of this even current iraq war vets who are still current duty and it is not a planet or helicopter...Please contact me let's find out what this is i need researchers.
content.summary: Driving e bound on i94 i witnessed a star like object hovering just n of the freeway that changed positions but stayed n of the freeway then blinked out like a light bulb being turned off.

content.detailedDescription:
At 1:30 a m this morning, july 23, 2009,  i was looking our of my office window and saw in the north east about 25-30 degrees up, what at first i took to be a star, but then it began flashing s o s like signals, so i watched it for about 5 or 6 minutes, then decided it wasn't going to be doing anything spectacular, so i went back to bed.
there were other stars also visible but they were just steady points of light which made me think that this 'flasher' was something out of the ordinary.  it appeared to be about the size of a half dollar and was quite bright.  i thought it must be about as distant as lake comanche (about 10-12 miles from my house).
just another ho-hum light in the sky, i guess, but now i wish i had watched for a longer time.
content.summary: Flashing star-like object in the north east.

content.detailedDescription: Four of us were driving, blinking light caught driver's attention, we stopped the car and we saw a stationary triangular object in the sky. many lights, green yellow red white, some oif which would go out occasionally. did not move at all, was completely stationary. sat and watched it for about 10 minutes, was still there while we drove away. at first thought it was a plane, but was too low, and completely stationary, and no nearby major airports or military bases. not helicopter, too big and was a clearly apparent triangular shape. sorry, no photos, just reactionary audio on a mini-cassete.
content.summary: Saw a triangular hovering stationary object with blinking lights
